members.name: isAvailable
members.description: Checks Whether TouchID is available or not.

members.name: verifyFingerprint
members.description: Show TouchID dialog and wait for a fingerprint scan. If user taps 'Enter Password' button, brings up standard system passcode screen.

members.name: verifyFingerprintWithCustomPasswordFallback
members.description: Show TouchID dialog and wait for a fingerprint scan. If user taps 'Enter Password' button, rejects with code '-3' (see above).

members.name: verifyFingerprintWithCustomPasswordFallbackAndEnterPasswordLabel
members.description: Show TouchID dialog with custom 'Enter Password' message and wait for a fingerprint scan. If user taps 'Enter Password' button, rejects with code '-3' (see above).

params.name: enterPasswordLabel
params.description: Custom text for the 'Enter Password' button

members.name: didFingerprintDatabaseChange
members.description: Checks if the fingerprint database changed.
